metadata.title: The Magic Zoo Sterling Silver Sleeping Dog Angel Pendant
features: This sterling silver jewelry design was handcrafted by Magic Zoo Artist Merry Rosenfield
Need a chain? Copy and paste the following into the Search Box: Sterling Silver Snake Chain with Lobster Clasp 18 Inch by The Magic Zoo
All our Sterling Silver jewelry is Made in the USA, supporting American business
We pride ourselves on our customer service and do our best to ship items to you quickly
The Magic Zoo jewelry gives you a 60 day money back guarantee
description: This sleeping dog angel pendant is meant to give comfort after losing a beloved companion. I designed this piece to be worn near the heart, on your pretty sterling silver chain. The dog pendant measures 5/8" tall and is 1/2" wide. There is a sterling silver bail attached so you can slip your chain right through. Bail opening is 3mm wide. I also have the sterling silver chains, which are sold separately.
